english_example_sentence: My mother and father allow their young children to play in the garden.
russian_example_sentence: Мои мама и папа разрешают своим маленьким детям играть в саду.
turkish_example_sentence: Annem ve babam küçük çocuklarına bahçede oynamaya izin veriyorlar.
